content: I think I'll focus on integrating my improv skills into my preparation, making sure to ground them in the text and the world of the play. I also want to make sure I'm not relying too heavily on my improv skills and that I'm still doing my due diligence in terms of script analysis, character research, and rehearsing my audition pieces. Do you think it would be helpful to record myself rehearsing and watch the footage to identify areas for improvement?
